sentences.en: " Well , Burgess deserves it -- he will never get another congregation here.
sentences.cn: " 可伯杰斯遭人恨是活该呀 -- 在这块地方,他再也别想有人听他布道了.

sentences.en: A great congregation of birds flew overhead.
Most members of the congregation begin arriving a few minutes before services.
sentences.cn: 礼拜仪式开始前几分钟，大部分教堂会众陆续到来。

sentences.en: Offerings from the congregation are small in hard times.
sentences.cn: 在困难的年代,会众的捐献很有限.

sentences.en: Several members of the congregation are away.
sentences.cn: 会众中有几个没有在场。

sentences.en: She preached to the congregation about forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 她向会众宣讲宽恕的道理。

sentences.en: The congregation assists at divine service.
The congregation bowed their heads in prayer.
The congregation fell back from them slightly as they entered.
sentences.cn: 教堂会众在他们进来时稍稍往后退了退。

sentences.en: The congregation processed into the church.
sentences.cn: 教徒们排着队走进教堂.

sentences.en: The preacher addressed a congregation of more than one thousand people.
sentences.cn: 传教士向一千多人的会众讲演.

sentences.en: The preacher blessed the congregation after his sermon.
sentences.cn: 牧师在讲道后祝福会众.

sentences.en: The priest preached to the congregation about the Sermon on the Mount.
sentences.cn: 那位祭司就山中圣训向会众说教.

sentences.en: The vicar preached to the congregation for half an hour.
sentences.cn: 那位教区牧师向会众讲道半个小时.

sentences.en: There was a rustling of dresses, and the standing congregation sat down.
sentences.cn: 站着的人们在一片衣服的沙沙声中都坐了下来.

trans.tran_en: a group of people gathered together in a church
